name: GrabbyBones
author: kafeijao
description:
Adds grabbing to `Dynamic Bones` and `Magica Cloth Bones`.

__**Features**__
- Uses the bone's radius configuration for grabbing radius.
- Sets animator parameters. Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/GrabbyBones)
- Can be disabled for specific scripts using `[NGB]` tag on the game object name.
- Prevent grabbing a specific bone within a script using `[NGBB]` tag on the bone's game object name.

__**Notes**__
- If you find broken avatars share the avatar and contact me.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/GrabbyBones) for more in-depth info.
changelog:
- Added the tag `[NGBB]` to prevent grabbing specific bones.
- Fixed enabled config not disabling properly.
- Fixed angle parameter being wrongly calculated
